markdownContent:
«Hello», rumbles a deep voice behind the door, «can I help you?»

«Probably, I'm starting an internship here today and wasn't sure through which entrance to enter.»

«Ah yes, I heard of you, the student of that crazy professor, right?»

«Right», you say with a knowing grin.

«My name's Hans Velum, I'm the caretaker of the museum. Shall I bring you to Laura?»
